function ERI_EP05_12()
    --.転-4【2月第2週】「『姫』として」

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0568.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】苦笑
 "Those old dudes never learn, huh." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01mb")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0358.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】興奮鼻血
 "Even in his true form, Onee-sama’s skills are the best... hehehe." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0372.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】苦笑
 "The hole from Daria-san’s absence is much bigger than I expected... This is going to be tough." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0887.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】真剣
 "Yes. Everyone, please cooperate." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    --//BG：2F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ At another time, I intervened to mediate a quarrel between students. ]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("short-hair-girl2_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Short-haired Female Student】
 "Because! Erika-hime was cross-dressing for her fallen sister, isn’t that what she said!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("short-hair-girl2_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Short-haired Female Student】
 "If you speak ill of Erika-hime again, I’ll cut off that unnecessarily long hair of yours!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("longhair-girl_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Long-haired Female Student】
 "That’s just a rumor, right? I was just expressing my opinion that supporting a cross-dressing guy like that is low-class." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("short-hair-girl2_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Short-haired Female Student】
 "Thinking that way is fine, but saying it out loud is war! Apologize to Erika-hime here and now!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("longhair-girl_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Long-haired Female Student】
 "I refuse. You should join the faction of the genuine beautiful girl, Hermes-onee-sama." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1246.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 "Let’s stop there. Everyone around is worried, you know?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("short-hair-girl2_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Short-haired Female Student】
 "E-Erika-hime!?" ]])

    MSG([[ When I stepped in between them, the two seniors who were arguing jumped back in surprise. ]])

    MSG([[ The short-haired senior is Shiho Komaki, a member of Daria-san’s faction. ]])

    MSG([[ The long-haired senior is Tomomi Iwakura, belonging to Hermes-san’s faction. ]])

    MSG([[ I heard the quarrel among students was heating up, so I came running, but to think they were knights belonging to the 'Himegami' family factions. ]])

    MSG([[ This was a first for me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("tomomi_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tomomi Iwakura】
 "You came running upon hearing insults about yourself? You sure have sharp ears." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1247.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "I don’t mind insults toward me, but I care if they cause quarrels." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1248.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "Such conflicts would surely make Hermes-san sad, saying 'That’s not cute!'" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("shiho_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Shiho Komaki】
 "B-But Iwakura-san insulted Erika-hime!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("tomomi_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tomomi Iwakura】
 "It’s Komaki’s fault for not understanding the greatness of Hermes-onee-sama!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1249.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "No matter how much you win a war of words, it won’t change the other’s mind. It just hurts them unnecessarily." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I conveyed this with as gentle a smile as possible, and they clearly toned down, unable to reply. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1250.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "At Yuriai Private Academy, 'cute' is justice. Whether it’s Hermes-san or me, who’s justice will be clear in the next Princess Election." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1251.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "So please, don’t force or be forced by anyone, and support the 'Princess' you like." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1252.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "Hermes-san and I both hope everyone can find the 'cute' that they like." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("shiho_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Shiho Komaki】
 "Erika-hime..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("tomomi_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Tomomi Iwakura】
 "Hmph! Whatever a cross-dressing guy says won’t affect me!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("tomomi_0006.wav")

    【Tomomi Iwakura】
 "B-but... that... truly, forcing others isn't pretty. I will reflect on that point." ]])

    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)

    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ As a 'Princess,' I want to somehow ease that anxiety. I feel I must ease it. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
PLAY_VOICE("shiho_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Shiho Komaki】
 "Erika-hime... please do your best, even for Daria-onee-sama." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("shiho_0004.wav")

    【Shiho Komaki】

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")

    【Erika】笑顔

    MSG([[ And now. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1255.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1258.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0146.wav")

    【Female Student】
 "Good day, Erika-hime." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0147.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1259.wav")

 "Erika is so diligent, huh." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0570.wav")

    【Lira】
 "You’ve been calling their names while greeting—don’t tell me you remember all the students’ names?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1260.wav")

    【Erika】

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0571.wav")

 "Haa~… That’s impressive. But that’s probably why your popularity is recovering so quickly." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Everyone wants to believe in Erika-onee-sama." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I understand because I doubted her at one time too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0362.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "When you doubt someone you love, your chest hurts and you can only think gloomy thoughts." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0363.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "That’s why, even if the information is uncertain, everyone chooses to believe. They don’t want to doubt Onee-sama anymore." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc007ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0374.wav")

    【Uran】

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1263.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0375.wav")

 "One can always doubt someone’s true intentions. If you’re scared of being betrayed, it’s best to doubt from the start." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0376.wav")

    【Uran】

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0377.wav")

    【Uran】

    【Erika】

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1265.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0300.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0301.wav")

    【Daria】
 "I wanted to stay by Marika’s side the whole time, but Akira told me, ‘Leave this to me and go to the academy.’" ]])

    【Daria】
 "Even if lies surround us, I am still one of the 'Princesses.'" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0303.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "My adorable juniors are working so hard." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0304.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I will at least have my 'knights' urge their support to rally behind Erika-kun." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1267.wav")

    【Erika】
 "...Thank you. That gives me great strength, truly." ]])

    MSG([[ That day, as she said herself, Daria-san declared her support for me. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to many of Daria-san’s knights joining my faction, my visible support rate improved significantly. ]])
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
